,
from local_tour
where belong_code = #{belongCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and id != #{id}

name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

duration = #{duration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
